text: Manuel Amadeu de Matos Matias, known as Matias (born 18 March 1964) is a Portuguese football manager and a former player. He currently manages Pasteleira. He played 13 seasons and 272 games in the Primeira Liga for Salgueiros, Vitória de Guimarães, União da Madeira, Leça, Gil Vicente, Vitória de Setúbal and Porto. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Salgueiros on 13 March 1983 in a game against Porto. ==Honours== ===Porto=== *Primeira Liga champion: 1995–96. ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:S.C.
